overview: Salvador lives a modest life.  He works a 9-to-5 in a cubicle doing some accounting.  His life is one of routine, but he has a knack for photography, which he won’t take up more than a hobby.  His life decisions come into question once he meets Olivia, a code monkey at the same corporation.  Through their budding friendship and a series of events Salvador is forced to answer the question, “Is quitting his day job and taking up photography worth the risk?”
title: In Drift
